passage_text: Loan forgiveness is the cancellation of all or some portion of your federal student loan balance. Yes, that’s right—cancellation of your loan balance. If your loan is forgiven, you are no longer required to repay that loan. There are a number of situations under which you can have your federal student loan balance forgiven, and we’ve provided a few in this post.
